body: Now she felt dumb now. She didn’t know what love is oh big dummy. The dude took advantage of that situation and got some booty. The mc can quit go to library now and take that as a lesson
I thought it was Naruto and Hinata from the cover

I did the same, the ending seems to be where she realizes she loves MC. And bad guy was like, “oh looks like I didn’t need to teach you what Love is.” And that’s when she has her breakdown at the end and realizes what happened. But again, have to wait and see from a translation.

This one hurt before I used image translating to get an idea of whats going on. Out of all this guys series this one hurts the most because its got the essence of true stealing. Well to be fair most of this authors series dont actually hurt and usually are so dumb that you can seperate fiction and reality and feel nothing.

 FMC is so retarded, so basically she asks the her male friend what love is and he replies you have to experience it first. Then the asshole comes and tells the girl you have to have sex first then love comes after and says that girls usually love him after having sex with him. She straight declines and says she'll never do it with something disgusting like him but then memory of her friend saying you have to experience love comes up so she agrees. I think it ends with the girl thinking/telling her friend she's in love with the scumbag for the true NTR feeling
my godd,, the girl is really my type of girl,, remind me of amane true intention ,, fuckking hoott,, haha
